suppress.notes: Squirrel-Mono.exe is part of the Electron build process for Windows auto-updates. These CVEs affect the Mono framework but are not exploitable in our build context. Build-time dependency only, not distributed to end users. Review date: 2025-12-01

liblzma.dll is a compression library used in the Electron build process. CVE-2022-1271 affects XZ utils but is not exploitable in our build context. Build-time dependency only, not distributed to end users. Review date: 2025-12-01
